attributes.action: Stop using coercion to influence people to take the Covid 19 vaccine.
attributes.additional_details:
The latest announcement from Boris Johnson regarding vaccine passports for Nightclubs is coercion and unfair.
The vaccine is still in trial until 2023 and long term data is unknown.
People should be free to either have or not have the vaccine as they wish without the fear of not being able to socialise / access public places.  This is coercion.  
A PCR or Antibody test is sufficient
attributes.background:
Stop plans to introduce Vaccine Passports for Nightclubs/Bars/Restaurants/Events in the UK

Clinical trials on the Covid 19 vaccine are ongoing.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/575801
